participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and social, Emily enjoys her time at the bar and is always eager to meet new people. She has a vibrant spirit and is passionate about her studies.
participant_1.background: i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i do not like chicken. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i recently got an apartment with my best friend.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and easy-going, Jake loves exploring different cultures through their cuisines. He's laid-back but strives to improve his cooking skills.
participant_2.background: hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i've been traveling the world for a years. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it.
